modName: Legend of Zelda Master Chest - DELETED
summary: This mod adds link's Robe and Master Sword to the Skyrim game.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This mod adds link's Robe and Master Sword to the Skyrim game. I know it's kind late for this but the user created mods have never satisfied me 
so I have decided it was time to port one of my zelda mods from Fallout New Vegas to the skyrim game. 

Who doesn't want to hack in slash as Link! 
Hope you enjoy!  

Location: 
you can find the Master Chest down by the Gildergreen Tree near the center of Whiterun Village
{see screenshot}

How to Install:
Place the contents of the mod in their specific folder in the Skyrim Directory. (C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data)

place the player save in your game saves folder (My Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves)

How to Uninstall:
Delete the folder called link in both textures and meshes. Don't forget to remove Masterchest.esp from your skyrim data folder.

Notes: Please let me know if you have any problems with the mod I will be sure to fix them asap. 

Disclaimer: 
I am not responsible for anything that happens to your game. This mod is created from the original skyrim game and has not been tested with the special edition of Skyrim.

please do not ask me to upload this to console because it won't happen. you are free to upload this mod as you see fit to whatever version of Skyrim you are playing on.  

Version:1.0 
Adds MasterSword and robe to the skyrim game. 

Credits:
Bethesda Softworks Skyrim game 

Slayer1o7
legend of zelda master chest mod
